::Slayer::

Slayer nods, looking at Prebon as he finishes putting on the suit.

"It is excellent, Master," he says, moving his arms to get used to 
the extra weight. His eyes light up at the word 'kill', "Ramulus will 
die then... May I ask who this Ramulus is?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon walked back into the room and watched Slayer put it on.
> 
> "Excellent. I hope you like it, because you'll be putting it to use 
> right away. Your first mission is to kill Ramulus!"
